item.title: Lipid Brain Atlas Released
item.description: We are excited to announce the release of the Lipid Brain Atlas - a high-resolution mapping of membrane lipids in the mouse brain! This work, led by Luca Fusar Bassini in collaboration with Giovanni D’Angelo’s lab, reveals that lipids act as zip codes for fine-grained brain anatomy. Key Discoveries Lipizones: A New Way to Map the Brain We discovered lipizones - brain territories defined purely by lipid composition, without any anatomical assumptions.
